info.message: If the modification of an option is during an exercice, it will be active at the launch of a new exercise.

chat.message: Use your words learned to make further progress with the community with a t'chat in the home page

ListenHebrew.message: TTS Hebrew : If you have need listen hebrew and the option above not supported hebrew language, selected this option. Choose 'Hebrew' language in exercice and highlight with your mouse a word or sentence(s) and click on the player !

ListenTTS.message: Text-To-Speech : To listen text, choose language in exercice and highlight with your mouse a word or sentence(s). To hear the text , it's spoken immediately. Languages supported :
